abstract: sprint corp major shareholder group corp softbank acquires 4,301,182 shares .
article: sprint corp major shareholder group corp softbank acquired 4,301,182 shares of the business 's stock in a transaction dated wednesday , january 3rd . the stock was purchased at an average price of $ 5.96 per share , with a total value of $ 25,635,044.72 . the acquisition was disclosed in a document filed with the sec , which is accessible through this hyperlink . major shareholders that own more than 10 % of a company 's shares are required to disclose their transactions with the sec . group corp softbank also recently made the following trade : on friday , december 28th , group corp softbank acquired 2,102,152 shares of sprint stock .

the stock was purchased at an average price of $ 5.92 per share , with a total value of $ 12,444,739.84 . on friday , december 29th , group corp softbank acquired 4,243,452 shares of sprint stock . the stock was purchased at an average price of $ 5.94 per share , with a total value of $ 25,206,104.88 . on wednesday , december 27th , group corp softbank acquired 4,282,600 shares of sprint stock . the stock was purchased at an average price of $ 5.85 per share , with a total value of $ 25,053,210.00 . on friday , december 22nd , group corp softbank acquired 2,563,780 shares of sprint stock .

the stock was purchased at an average price of $ 5.69 per share , with a total value of $ 14,587,908.20 . on wednesday , december 20th , group corp softbank bought 5,095,549 shares of sprint stock . the shares were bought at an average cost of $ 5.64 per share , for a total transaction of $ 28,738,896.36 . on monday , december 18th , group corp softbank bought 5,039,477 shares of sprint stock . the shares were bought at an average cost of $ 5.60 per share , for a total transaction of $ 28,221,071.20 . on thursday , december 14th , group corp softbank bought 3,231,117 shares of sprint stock .

the shares were bought at an average cost of $ 5.68 per share , for a total transaction of $ 18,352,744.56 . on monday , december 4th , group corp softbank bought 1,045,040 shares of sprint stock . the shares were bought at an average cost of $ 5.99 per share , for a total transaction of $ 6,259,789.60 . on thursday , november 30th , group corp softbank bought 961,380 shares of sprint stock . the shares were bought at an average cost of $ 5.99 per share , for a total transaction of $ 5,758,666.20 . on wednesday , november 15th , group corp softbank bought 2,633,814 shares of sprint stock .

the shares were bought at an average cost of $ 5.98 per share , for a total transaction of $ 15,750,207.72 . sprint corp opened at $ 5.80 on friday . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 22,521.95 , a price-to-earnings ratio of -38.66 and a beta of 0.79 . sprint corp has a 52-week low of $ 5.42 and a 52-week high of $ 9.65 . the company has a current ratio of 1.10 , a quick ratio of 1.03 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 1.80 . sprint last posted its quarterly earnings results on wednesday , october 25th .

the cell phone carrier reported earnings per share for the quarter , beating the consensus estimate of by $ 0.01 . sprint had a negative return on equity of 3.19 % and a negative net margin of 1.82 % . the firm had revenue of $ 7.93 billion for the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 8.05 billion . during the same period in the previous year , the firm earned earnings per share . sprint 's quarterly revenue was down 3.9 % on a year-over-year basis . equities analysts predict that sprint corp will post -0.02 eps for the current fiscal year .

hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently modified their holdings of the business . bank of new york mellon corp grew its stake in sprint by 1.5 % in the third quarter . bank of new york mellon corp now owns 3,595,501 shares of the cell phone carrier 's stock valued at $ 27,973,000 after purchasing an additional 54,865 shares in the last quarter . state of wisconsin investment board grew its stake in sprint by 3.9 % in the third quarter . state of wisconsin investment board now owns 954,107 shares of the cell phone carrier 's stock valued at $ 7,423,000 after purchasing an additional 35,910 shares in the last quarter .

overbrook management corp purchased a new position in sprint in the second quarter valued at about $ 3,564,000 . swiss national bank grew its stake in sprint by 3.0 % in the second quarter . swiss national bank now owns 2,905,351 shares of the cell phone carrier 's stock valued at $ 23,853,000 after purchasing an additional 83,900 shares in the last quarter . finally , fmr llc grew its stake in sprint by 3.1 % in the second quarter . fmr llc now owns 3,835,837 shares of the cell phone carrier 's stock valued at $ 31,492,000 after purchasing an additional 115,192 shares in the last quarter .

hedge funds and other institutional investors own 13.74 % of the company 's stock . a number of equities research analysts have recently issued reports on s shares . oppenheimer reaffirmed a `` hold '' rating on shares of sprint in a research report on wednesday , september 20th . zacks investment research raised sprint from a `` hold '' rating to a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 8.50 target price on the stock in a research report on tuesday , october 3rd . deutsche bank cut their target price on sprint from $ 8.00 to $ 7.00 and set a `` hold '' rating on the stock in a research report on tuesday , october 10th .

keycorp reaffirmed a `` hold '' rating on shares of sprint in a research report on wednesday , october 11th . finally , valuengine lowered sprint from a `` hold '' rating to a `` sell '' rating in a research report on monday , october 16th . seven investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , twelve have issued a hold rating and three have given a buy rating to the stock . the company currently has an average rating of `` hold '' and a consensus target price of $ 6.72 . warning : this news story was posted by watch list news and is the property of of watch list news .
